Shift-Right-Click, "Copy as Path"

...standard Explorer feature. Did you miss it?

No it wasn't missed Axelriet, the feature you talk about was added in Windows Vista. However at work like many others I still have to use XP and require a feature like this that will resolve the UNC path for mapped drives, therefore I created this utility and as I know there are still many others out there that have to use older versions of Windows I made the utility available here as it may also be of use to them.

Primarily I'm a C# and Java developer and although I have written C++ before I have very little experience of Windows programming and while putting this utility together had to do a lot of reading around to work out how to do it, therefore I decided to publish the code so that others may use this code to learn from if they wish as the actual application code is very simple for this program.
